title: Cardi B, Chance, T.I. Star in Netflix Rhythm + Flow Trailer
text: Netflix dropped the first teaser trailer for Rhythm + Flow on Sunday, and it’s reassuring to see them focused on what audiences really want to see: Cardi B laughing maniacally, eating giant strawberries, flying on a private jet. Audiences also want to see amazing artists, of course, which is why Netflix ordered ten episodes of the hip-hop competition show, which features performers from Atlanta, Chicago, Los Angeles and New York squaring off in an American Idol-style reality show. However, if anyone is primed to achieve (or surpass) Simon Cowell, Michael Kors and Tyra levels of judgement, it’s Cardi B, swerving wildly on a golf cart alongside her fellow judges Chance the Rapper and T.I. Rhythm + Flow premieres on Netflix October 9.
description: Cardi B joins Chance the Rapper and and T.I. in the first look at Netflix’s upcoming hip-hop and competition show Rhythm + Flow.
